source.name: Do basic git commands_1
source.instructions:
Drag the commands into the designated area to:

1. Add all of the revised files to the staging area
2. Check the status of the files in the staging area
3. Move the staged files to the repository, adding to the version history
4. Save the revisions to the remote repository.
source.initial:
git add .
git status
git commit
git push
git check  #distractor
git save  #distractor
git checkout  #distractor
